title: Fetterman’s Debate Showing Raises Democratic Anxieties in Senate Battle
description: The Democratic nominee’s performance in Pennsylvania thrust questions of health to the center of a pivotal Senate race, adding uncertainty to the contest and worrying some in his party.
dc:creator: Lisa Lerer and Katie Glueck
media:credit: Caroline Gutman for The New York Times
media:description: Disability advocates and doctors praised Lt. Gov. John Fetterman for his debate appearance and noted that his speech did not reflect any cognitive impairment, but some Democrats worried that ordinary voters might see it differently.
